📄 Descrizione: A blazingly fast, context-aware directory tree tool co-created by human and AI for optimal information density across multiple output formats. item.title: 🦀 hsnyildiz/tinykv (42 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: hsnyildiz

📝 Repository: hsnyildiz/tinykv

📄 Descrizione: `tinykv` is a lightweight, `serde`-powered key-value storage engine with optional TTL (time-to-live) support, atomic saving, and human-readable persistence via JSON. Perfect for config storage, CLI apps, prototyping, testing, and anywhere you need a simple persistent store without setting up a database.

⭐ Stelle: 42
